name: Geez Pyro Userbot
description: An first Telegram Userbot with multi Clients for Spamming or Mass.

API_ID.description: Dapatkan API KEY di Grup » https://t.me/GeezSupport » Lalu ketik /get api atau di web my.telegram.org Masukan yg APP ID Telegram

API_HASH.description: Dapatkan API Hash di Grup » https://t.me/GeezSupport » Lalu ketik /get api atau di web my.telegram.org

STRING_SESSION1.description: fill with the pyrogram session string from https://t.me/geezramstringbot

OWNER_ID.description: fill your I'd (can access all things)

BOT_TOKEN.description: fill with your bot token get from @BotFather on telegram
